Body:
"""

    demonstrate get_func_cmt().

    see github issue #30 for the backstory.

    """
cd = os.path.dirname(__file__)
idbpath = os.path.join(cd, 'data', 'issue30', 'issue30.i64')
with idb.from_file(idbpath) as db:
    api = idb.IDAPython(db)
    assert api.idc.GetCommentEx(4199832, 0) == 'local cmt'
    assert api.idc.GetCommentEx(4199832, 1) == ''
    assert api.ida_funcs.get_func_cmt(4199832, 0) == 'rep cmt'
    assert api.ida_funcs.get_func_cmt(4199832, 1) == 'rep cmt'
